content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I am glad that you are interested in renting it. As a landlord, I am always looking for ways to maximize my gains, and I believe that I can offer you a fair rental price that will work for both of us. What rental price are you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to negotiate the rental price with you. Can you give me an initial offer?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Of course, as a landlord, I am willing to negotiate the rental price with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer for the apartment is 800 Euros per month. This rental price takes into consideration the location and the size of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Mannheim. What do you think of this initial offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
800 Euros is too high. Can you lower the price?

I am willing to pay 700 Euros per month.

Can you give me your final offer?

TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your response, Baihu Li. I understand that you are looking for a more competitive rental price, and I am willing to work with you to find a mutually agreeable solution. Based on our negotiations, I am willing to lower the rental price to 700 Euros per month. This rental price takes into consideration the current market rates in Mannheim and the size and location of the apartment. I hope that this final offer works for you. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine
